modules.description: Provides acceleration and rotation rate data retrieval through device motion sensors. Operates on structured data including timestamps, x, y, z values, and confidence levels. Used to track real-time device movement in applications like gesture recognition and motion-based gaming.

Provides functions to extract x, y, and z acceleration values and a timestamp from an acceleration object. Offers methods to retrieve current acceleration data and continuously monitor changes with customizable update frequency. Manages watch identifiers to stop ongoing acceleration tracking.
